short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and very silly To-Do list designed for people who prefer a user friendly format that includes from Mon-Sun.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Silly To-Do list is a unique way to organize your tasks by giving you a structure from Monday through Sunday for those looking a more simplier way to keep track of tasks.

Special features include -
→Customizable Color Schemes
→Extra Detail Space
→Completed Task Counter
→Fun, Easy, and User Friendly Format

This extension is intended to be used by all different kinds of backgrounds depending on your needs such as students, parents, employees, and more!

Feel free to leave feedback and tell us what you've liked and disliked so that we can always improve our model.
